laboratory_examinations.findings: No growth or grew Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus epidermidis, and Serratia marcescens.
Papillomatosis with marked hyperkeratosis and parakeratosis, consistent with a hyperproliferative, ichthyosiform picture.
Heterozygous substitution of thymidine for cytosine at nucleotide position 119 (C119T) resulting in A40V mutation.
